name: Ball Match Quest
description:
Escape from boredom and stimulate your mind by moving your finger and using your talent for solving puzzles. Collect stars to unlock special items to help them pass very tricky levels. Offering 4 different game modes, there are power ball, color bombs, and various another magical booster to help with challenging levels. Take on this fantastic Ball Match Quest along or play with your friends to see who can get the top score!
-----------------------------------------------
1. Join the most unique match 3 puzzle adventures FREE now!
2. Move candy balls group freely and create explosive matches. New style match game. You won’t find anywhere else.
3. Use your skills, logic, and imagination to become a match-3 master.
-----------------------------------------------
HOW TO PLAY:
● MOVE & MATCH - Move the candy balls left and right, slow down or fast down with your finger. Tap to rotate. Move the candy balls to match the same color candy balls and create special candy balls.
● GHOST BALLS - Use the Ghost Piece to determine the best fit for the falling candy balls. This helpful guide appears directly below the falling candy ball and displays possible placements.
● HOLD BUBBLE - Store falling candy balls in the Hold Bubble for later use.
These are the kinds of things that you’ll probably never see in any other match-3 and they’re exactly why you should play this game.
-----------------------------------------------
GAME FEATURES:
1.Free to play and fun for everyone!
2. Offer 4 different game modes.
3. Power ball, color Bombs and various another magical booster to help with challenging levels.
4. Collect stars to unlock special items to help you pass those tricky levels.
5. Spin the wheel to earn daily rewards.
6. Start off easy but gets challenging fast. Take on this fantastic Ball Match Quest along or play with your friends to see who can get the top score!

EASY AND FUN PLAY
1. Easy to control, fun to play, great graphics!
2. Just move & match with your single finger!
